com.valentine.esp.bluetooth

Class BluetoothDeviceBundle

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.valentine.esp.bluetooth.BluetoothDeviceBundle

  • public class BluetoothDeviceBundle
extends java.lang.Object
    A Wrapper to bundle a BluetoothDevice, and it's RSSI value.
    Author:
    jdavis

    • Constructor Detail

      • BluetoothDeviceBundle

        public BluetoothDeviceBundle(BluetoothDevice device,
                     int rssi,
                     long timeDiscovered,
                     ConnectionType deviceType)
        Create a BluetoothDeviceBundle that holds a BluetoothDevice, an RSSI (Received signal strength indication) value, and discovery time.
        Parameters:
        device - BluetoothDevice to store. Not allowed to be null.
        rssi - The last RSSI value of the BluetoothDevice. Can be 0.
        timeDiscovered - The time of discovery of the BluetoothDevice. Can be 0.
        deviceType - The connection type of the Bluetooth discovery.

    • Method Detail

      • getDevice

        public BluetoothDevice getDevice()
        Retrieve the BluetoothDevice device, this BluetoothDeviceBundle represents.
        Returns:
        The BluetoothDevice contained in the BluetoothDeviceBundle.

      • getRssi

        public int getRssi()
        Retrieve the last RSSI value for the contained BluetoothDevice, received from the Bluetooth framework.
        Returns:
        The last received RSSI value for the BluetoothDevice.

      • setRssi

        public void setRssi(int mRssi)
        Set the RSSI value for the contained BluetoothDevice, received from the Bluetooth framework.
        Parameters:
        mRssi - The new RSSI value of the contained BluetoothDevice.

      • getTimeDiscovered

        public long getTimeDiscovered()
        Returns the last time the BluetoothDevice was discovered.
        Returns:
        The last time the BluetoothDevice was discovered.

      • setTimeDiscovered

        public void setTimeDiscovered(long mTimeDiscovered)
        Sets the last time the BluetoothDevice was discovered.
        Parameters:
        mTimeDiscovered - The last time the device was discovered.
